approvedServiceList.description: Used to derive keys using various standardized functions

approvedServiceList.name: Symmetric Encrypt/Decrypt
approvedServiceList.description: Used to encrypt or decrypt data. Executes using AES EDK or GCM key.

approvedServiceList.description: Used to generate a SHA2-256 message digest

approvedServiceList.description: Used to generate or verify data integrity with HMAC. Executes using HMAC Key.
approvedServiceList.inputs: Data to be hashed and key

approvedServiceList.name: Key Wrapping Encrypt (KW)
approvedServiceList.description: Used to encrypt a key value on behalf of the calling application. Executes using AES Key Wrapping Key.

approvedServiceList.name: Key Wrapping Decrypt (KW)
approvedServiceList.description: Used to decrypt a key value on behalf of the calling application. Executes using AES Key Wrapping Key.

approvedServiceList.name: Key Agreement/ Agreement Component (SP 800-56A rev3, SP  800-56B rev2)
